translation.en: Where are you taking me?
Where are you taking me?
[female over intercom] Fimbra Control, Alouette 5 is in range.
translation.ja: フィンブラ･コントロール射程内です

translation.en: Apply the blindfold, please.
Blindfold?
Hell, no! No way!
This enforced incarceration is unsanctioned, unwarranted,
translation.ja: この連行は無許可で不当な上

translation.en: and unconstitutional!
-What the fuck are you doing? -[system dings]
Who is flying this thing?
Fimbra Control, remote landing sequence has begun.
translation.ja: 遠隔着陸を開始します

translation.en: Hey, hey, man! Hey!
Where are you taking me?
What is this?
[man] In due time, Professor Clark.
translation.ja: クラーク教授　お待ちを

translation.en: No, the time is due. Now is the due time. Are you gonna kill me?
translation.ja: 今言え　俺を殺すのか？

translation.en: I'm not scared or nothing. I'm just curious.
[man 2] Well, according to the world, Professor Clark, you're already dead.
translation.ja: クラーク教授はすでに死んでいます

translation.en: Who are you?
[in Australian accent] Bruce Baldwin.
translation.ja: ブルース･ボルドウィン

translation.en: [in New York accent] Shep Gordon.
[in Russian accent] I am the one they call Mishu.
[in British accent] And I am Lord Lordington.
translation.ja: 私はローディントン卿

translation.en: Together, we are…
[all] The Pentaverate.
[narrator] In 1347, five learned men realized
translation.ja: 1347年 ５人の学者が黒死病の原因を

translation.en: that the black plague was caused by fleas on rats.
translation.ja: ネズミにつくノミと特定した

translation.en: However, the Church believed the plague to be God's punishment,
translation.ja: だが教会は黒死病を神の罰と信じ

translation.en: labeling these five men heretics.
So they formed a benevolent secret society to influence world events, known as
translation.ja: そこで５人は 世界を操る善なる秘密結社を結成し

translation.en: The Pentaverate.
Throughout the centuries, there have been many secret organizations.
translation.ja: 秘密結社はどの時代にも存在するが

translation.en: What makes the Pentaverate different?
They're nice.
-[upbeat music playing] -[man] You're watching CACA Toronto.
translation.ja: 「CACAトロント」です 「CACAトロント」です 〝ＣＡＣＡニューストロント〞 〝ＣＡＣＡニューストロント〞

translation.en: Welcome back. I'm Darleen Windelchuck.
translation.ja: ダーリーン･ウィンデルチャックです

translation.en: Hard-hitting and breaking now,
nuclear physicist Professor Hobart Clark has died of an apparent broken neck.
translation.ja: 〝クラーク教授が死去〞原子物理学者のクラーク教授が 〝クラーク教授が死去〞 〝クラーク教授が死去〞首を骨折し死亡

translation.en: Oakland Police say Clark died attempting the "kiss the star" challenge,
translation.ja: 警察によると原因は〝星にキスチャレンジ〞 〝星にキスチャレンジで首を骨折〞警察によると原因は〝星にキスチャレンジ〞 〝星にキスチャレンジで首を骨折〞

translation.en: the latest Internet craze, where people are challenged to kiss their own anus.
translation.ja: 〝星にキスチャレンジで首を骨折〞ネットで大流行ですが〝星〞とは肛門のこと ネットで大流行ですが〝星〞とは肛門のこと 〝お尻にキスで死亡〞ネットで大流行ですが〝星〞とは肛門のこと 〝お尻にキスで死亡〞

translation.en: Professor Clark was 57.
And finally, a report from Canada's own lovable Ken Scarborough.
translation.ja: 〝ケンのコーナー〞最後は大人気のケン･スカボローから 最後は大人気のケン･スカボローから 〝ケンのトロント〞最後は大人気のケン･スカボローから

translation.en: Ken Scarborough here at the Toronto Sportsman Show.
translation.ja: トロントで開催中のスポーツ･ショーで

translation.en: There's plenty of things to do, whether you're into skeet-shooting…
translation.ja: 多彩なスポーツの体験を

translation.en: …or fly-fishing.
Over there's a 1,000-pound bull made entirely out of butter.
translation.ja: 450キロのバターでできた牛もいます

translation.en: We asked some Torontonians what they thought of this year's Sportsman Show.
translation.ja: 地元の人に感想を聞きました

translation.en: Hey, buddy, why don't you take off your clothes and bear with me?
translation.ja: 僕と一緒なら裸でも困(クマ)らない？

translation.en: What's your favorite part about this year's Sportsman Show?
translation.ja: 今年のショーは何を楽しんだ？

translation.en: Oh my God, you're Ken Scarborough.
Yes, I am.
You're still alive?
I certainly am.
But you must be, like, 100 years old?
You're lucky I don't…
Not tonight, deer. I've got a headache!

translation.en: I haven't had this much fun since I was at a nudist colony
translation.ja: こんなに楽しい経験をしたのは

translation.en: and accidentally backed into a meat thermometer.
translation.ja: 裸体主義者の取材以来です

translation.en: But wherever you go at the Sportsman Show,
translation.ja: このスポーツ･ショーでは

translation.en: you're never too far from a couple of lovely ladies.
translation.ja: すてきな女性たちに会えますよ

translation.en: Ken Scarborough, CACA News.
translation.ja: ケン･スカボローでした

translation.en: From all of us at CACA Toronto News, good night, and do your best, eh?
translation.ja: CACAニューストロントでしたおやすみなさい

translation.en: [man] Up next, Canada's favorite quiz show, Close Enough,
translation.ja: 次はカナダの大人気クイズ番組

translation.en: where to win, you only have to be…
[man and audience] Close enough!
And we're clear!
Nice job. See you tomorrow. Great job. See you tomorrow.
translation.ja: お疲れ様 明日もよろしく

translation.en: Mrs. Snee, what did you think of my piece tonight?
translation.ja: スニーさん　感想は？

translation.en: Ken, we should talk. It's about time we talk about your future.
translation.ja: ケン　将来のことを話さないと

translation.en: Could be a slow process. Keep it just between us.
translation.ja: 急がないでここだけの話よ

translation.en: What are you saying, boss?
Good luck with the retirement, Ken.
Ah, jumpin' German Jesus, Darleen. I was working up to it!
translation.ja: ダーリーンよくも横から…

translation.en: Are you giving me the old heave-ho?
I don't wanna be a shit heel, Ken,
but man-on-the-street opinions come from Twitter now!
You're a nice guy. Jeez.
You've even been on the cover of Canadian Nice Magazine.
translation.ja: 「カナダのいい人」の表紙だし

translation.en: But this show needs big stories. Hard-hitting news!
translation.ja: でも番組には衝撃的なニュースが欲しい

translation.en: Hard-hitting?
Well, tomorrow, I'm covering the Canadian Conspiracy Convention.
translation.ja: 明日は“カナダ陰謀論会議”の取材だ

translation.en: You know? CanConCon.
translation.ja: “カナダ陰謀論会議(カンコンコン)”だよ

translation.en: You know, retirement would be the perfect time for you to travel.
I don't want to travel!
I want to stay right here in Toronto, giving voice to the common man.
translation.ja: トロントで市民の声を取材したい

translation.en: Mrs. Snee, this job is all I have left in the whole world.
translation.ja: スニーさん僕にはこの仕事しかない

translation.en: Please,
give me one more chance.
Okay, I'll give you one more shot. Jeez!
translation.ja: 仕方ないわね　１回だけよ

translation.en: Oh, but, Ken… [sighs]
…if you can't come up with a hard-hitting piece,
translation.ja: 平凡なニュースならその時は―

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[gasps] I'm sorry you're sorry, frankly.
translation.ja: 正直 僕も ごめんよ

translation.en: If you're sorry, you're gonna make me sorry.
Sorry.
Hey!
Aw, Darleen told me you're getting canceled, eh?
translation.ja: ダーリーンから聞いた

translation.en: Yeah, telephone, telegraph, tell-Darleen.
translation.ja: 彼女はおしゃべりだからね

translation.en: Big mouth.
I can't believe it.
This job's all I've ever wanted to do.
Maybe you're destined for something greater.
I don't think I believe in that destiny junk.
I know we haven't worked together long, but I believe in you.
translation.ja: でも私はあなたを信じてる

translation.en: You're a good person. You're kind. The work you do matters.
translation.ja: いい人だし重要な仕事をしてる

translation.en: You're my mentor. [chuckles] Kind of remind me of my dad.

translation.en: Aw, thanks.
Except you don't drink, and you didn't leave my mom for some hosebag.

translation.en: Okey dokey.
Let's go find a big story, eh? I know we can find it at CanConCon.

translation.en: [sighs] I hope so, Reilly.
It's just this conspiracy theory stuff sounds like a load of balloon juice to me.
translation.ja: バカげた陰謀論だと思うけどね

translation.en: Ugh! Believe!
All right, I'm believing.
-[Reilly] Maybe we'll catch Bigfoot! -[Ken] That'd be nice.

translation.en: Congratulations.
You've just been kidnapped
into the world's oldest and most effective secret society.
translation.ja: 世界で最古の秘密結社に誘拐された

translation.en: The Pentaverate.
I'm Rob Lowe.
Thank you.
The Pentaverate is a benevolent, fully sequestered secret society
translation.ja: ペンタベレートは1347年に結成された―

translation.en: of five men, who, since 1347, have been experts in their fields.
translation.ja: ５人の学者からなる善なる秘密結社だ

translation.en: Men like Leonardo da Vinci,
translation.ja: レオナルド･ダ･ビンチや

translation.en: Jonas Salk,
and the Quaker Oats guy.
translation.ja: オートミールの人がいた

translation.en: The current Pentaverate consists of Lord Lordington,
translation.ja: 現在のペンタベレート構成員は 最上位会員のローディントン卿

translation.en: our highest-ranking member,
translation.ja: 最上位会員のローディントン卿

translation.en: former Australian media mogul Bruce Baldwin,
translation.ja: 豪州の元メディア王ブルース･ボルドウィン

translation.en: ex-member of Putin's oligarchy Mishu Ivanov,
translation.ja: プーチンの元オリガルヒミシュ･イワノフ

translation.en: Alice Cooper's former manager, the legendary Shep Gordon,
translation.ja: アリス･クーパーの元助手で 伝説のシェップ･ゴードン

translation.en: and you.
We pay our respects to your predecessor, who died two days ago, Jason Eccleston,
translation.ja: ２日前に死んだジェイソン･エクルストンに敬意を

translation.en: the tech genius who invented our supercomputer, MENTOR.
translation.ja: スパコン〝メントー〞の天才開発者だ

translation.en: A little bit about myself.
I'm in a polyamorous relationship with two life-sized companion dolls.
translation.ja: 等身大の人形２体と恋愛していて

translation.en: I also do up close sex magic.
I both read and masturbate to tarot.
translation.ja: タロット占い中にオナニーも

translation.en: God, is… is this for real?
I know what you're asking yourself. "Is this for real?"
The answer is, yes!
You may also be asking, "When do I start running the world?"
translation.ja: いつから世界を牛耳ってるかって？

translation.en: Well, let's try walking the world first.
And as for me, well, I'm not in the Pentaverate.
I'm just an actor who will have his memory wiped after this video…
translation.ja: ただの俳優で収録後には記憶を消され…

translation.en: -What? -[electronic zaps]
Welcome aboard. We're happy to have you!
translation.ja: ようこそ 歓迎します

translation.en: And remember, the Pentaverate must never be exposed.
translation.ja: ペンタベレートを口外すべからず

translation.en: [all together] The Pentaverate must never be exposed.
Tell Rob he did a great job.
So you're telling me I'm now a member
of a secret organization called the Pentaverate?
Was this not clear?
Yeah, okay. I'm out.
[Lordington] I'm afraid that's not possible, Professor.
translation.ja: 教授 それはできません

translation.en: You see, your death was faked in the real world.
translation.ja: 現実世界で君の死が偽装された

translation.en: Okay, then, so how'd I die?
I will say this. It was memorable.
translation.ja: 歴史に残る死に方だよ

translation.en: We've all had our deaths faked. I died from an unprovoked shark attack.
translation.ja: 私も“理由なく”サメに襲われて死んだ

translation.en: Is there such a thing as a provoked shark attack?
translation.ja: サメの攻撃に理由があると？

translation.en: Like you're standing by the seaside going, "You bastard prick shark, come get me!"

translation.en: Wait a sec. How are you gonna call yourselves benevolent
translation.ja: 待て　こんな人が会員で

translation.en: if you're gonna let this bullshit-slinging hate-monger walk around?
Uh, because sometimes you need thief to catch thief.
translation.ja: 泥棒を捕らえるには泥棒が要る

translation.en: Wolf to catch wolf. Anteater to catch ant--

translation.en: -Uh, thank you, Mishu. Thank you. -Okay.
Bruce invented the tricks of media distortion that the evil wealthy use.

translation.en: He's somewhat of a reformed character now.
translation.ja: ブルースはメディアを歪曲(わいきょく)し金持ちを騙(だま)したが ペンタベレートが彼を善人に変えた

translation.en: The Pentaverate will do that to you.
translation.ja: ペンタベレートが彼を善人に変えた

translation.en: This ain't right. I'm a nuclear scientist.
I was two years away from cracking cold fusion!
translation.ja: 常温核融合まであと２年だった

translation.en: Oh, come on, Professor. It was always "two more years."
translation.ja: 何年も〝あと２年〞と言ってた

translation.en: It was never gonna happen.
You can do more good here.
translation.ja: ここで善行すればいい

translation.en: I'm Patty, executive assistant to the Pentaverate Five.
translation.ja: ペンタベレート５の助手パティよ

translation.en: Patty, you don't need to say "Pentaverate Five."
"Pentaverate" is five.
[Shep] It's like saying "ATM machine."
The "M" is "machine."
So, basically, you'd be saying "automated teller machine machine."
translation.ja: つまり現金自動預払マシンマシンだ

translation.en: Thanks for the mansplain-ation, Shep.
Enough about me.
I'll talk about me!
I'm from Massapequa, Long Island.
I like to call it Matzo-Pizza,
translation.ja: マッツォピザって呼んでる

translation.en: 'cause it's half-Italian, half-Jewish.
Matzo-Pizza. Isn't that cute?
Listen, you're part of a very powerful organization
translation.ja: いい？この組織は強力だから

translation.en: that'll finally allow you to shine.
Some people, by the way, would kill to be in a secret cabal.

translation.en: Professor, this is a crisis.
Jason Eccleston's death was sudden and unexpected.

translation.en: You are the last, best hope at solving climate change.
translation.ja: あなたは 気候変動を解決する最後の望み

translation.en: You're an expert,
but you won't be doing this alone. MENTOR!
translation.ja: でも助手がいますよメントー！

translation.en: [in Boston accent] Professor Clark, I'm MENTOR.
translation.ja: どうも　俺はメントー

translation.en: [Lordington] MENTOR is the greatest supercomputer in the world.
translation.ja: 世界一のスーパーコンピューターで

translation.en: It goes beyond artificial intelligence, because it contains a human soul.
translation.ja: 人間の魂を持つ人工知能です

translation.en: [MENTOR] Basically, I'm wicked smart!
Unfortunately, our human soul was some Masshole from Boston
translation.ja: 人間の魂はゴミみたいなもんだから

translation.en: who accidentally fell into the machine. Just our luck.
[MENTOR] Hey, Shep.
You know what else I fell into?
translation.ja: 過去に俺がいた場所は

translation.en: Your Mom's vag.
-[chuckles] -Class act.
Is it possible to hide our dysfunction from the new guy?
translation.ja: 傑作だな 機能不全を隠蔽(いんぺい)しないと

translation.en: You wanna talk about dysfunction? Y'all just kidnapped a Black man!
translation.ja: 機能不全？君らは黒人を誘拐した

translation.en: We've been kidnapping white men for years. We want to give you an opportunity as well.
translation.ja: 黒人にも機会を与えるべきと思ってね

translation.en: Forget about him. Basically, we're the good guys. We want you to trust us.
translation.ja: 僕たちは善人だから信頼してほしい

translation.en: Why should I trust you, white man?
Whiter man?
-Older whiter man? -[scoffs]
-I don't know what to make out of you. -[hisses]
All other questions will be answered at your Initiato.
translation.ja: 他の質問は入会儀式(イニシアト)の際に

translation.en: My what?
Your Initiato!
Your initiation ritual.
Okay, okay. Look.
Y'all are crazy. I'm outta here.
No, no, no, no, no. You need to rest, for tomorrow you have Initiato,
translation.ja: そう言うな明日は入会儀式だから

translation.en: and you must "fuck us."
What? Hell, no!
I will not do that!
You must "fuck us" very hard.
He's saying "focus." He's Russian.
translation.ja: ロシア語なまりよフォーカスしてってこと

translation.en: Yeah, "fuck us," what?
Yeah, okay. I'm out.
-Yes. -[metal clanks]
This will allow you to sleep, Professor.
[Hobart] What you talking about, sleep? Y'all got gas masks on?
Shit.
Hey, wait, listen. No, no, wait. Hold on.
Y'all are never gonna keep me prisoner…
Anecdotally, in my country, ATM is "ass-to-mouth" machine. Yeah.
translation.ja: 私の国では〝尻から口(Ａ-Ｔ-Ｍ)〞マシンだよ

translation.en: Good morning, Pentaverate!
The time is 6 a.m. in New York, 12 p.m. in Dubrovnik.

translation.en: I'm Maria Menounos for Pentaverate TV,
translation.ja: ペンタベレートＴＶのマリア･メヌノスです

translation.en: your one-stop shop for all things Pentaverate.
translation.ja: どんなことでもご用命を

translation.en: Help!
Is anybody out there?
[Maria] Inquiring minds want to know
who the potential new face in the Pentaverate is.
translation.ja: 気になる新会員について

translation.en: Well, look no further than nuclear physicist Hobart Clark,
translation.ja: 原子物理学者のクラーク教授です

translation.en: who joined us last nightafter his untimely death in the normie-world,

translation.en: doing the "kiss the star" challenge,
the latest Internet craze where people are trying to kiss their own asshole!
translation.ja: 自分のお尻にキスをするチャレンジです

translation.en: What? These mother…
Or as the kids are calling it,
a locally sourced rim job.
I'm Maria Menounos.
[Hobart] Dead?
translation.ja: 死んだ？ 〝クラーク教授死去〞

translation.en: "Fixated with the wrong star."
translation.ja: “星を見誤った”？ 〝クラーク教授の不審な死〞

translation.en: Asshole? These motherf--
translation.ja: ケツ穴？　クソ野郎… 〝ケツ穴クラークの死〞

translation.en: Good morning, Professor Clark! Do you like your quarters?
translation.ja: おはよう　部屋は快適？

translation.en: What the fuck is this? Kissing my own asshole?
translation.ja: これは何だ？自分のケツにキス？

translation.en: You say that as if it's a bad thing.
It was almost gonna be autoerotic asphyxiation,
translation.ja: 自己発情窒息の寸前で

translation.en: but it wasn't, so it's a happy.
And what, am I a prisoner in my own room?
Just a formality till Katie in HR gets you your own security fob.

translation.en: Let me give you a tour. Come.
Oh no, Sasquatch! No, no, no. Bad, bad Bigfoot. No, come. [kisses]
translation.ja: まあサスカッチ！ダメよ　ビッグフット

translation.en: I'm sorry, Sasquatch?
Bullshit! That's a guy in a suit. That's all that is.
Okay, not a man in a suit.
Don't mind Sassy. He's just our guard dog.
translation.ja: いいのよ　彼は番犬だから

translation.en: But if you try to escape, he's gonna get ya. Right, Sassy? -[growls softly] -[Patty] Yes.
translation.ja: でも逃げたらダメよ彼が追ってくる

translation.en: -[Sasquatch breathes heavily] -Let's continue your tour.
Are you single?
-What? -What?
Did you just ask me if I'm single?
Did I?
[woman over speaker] Sasquatch cleanup in Hall 3B.
You know, Reilly, we gotta get ourselves a big story,
translation.ja: ライリースクープを取るぞ

translation.en: and I'm talking Wayne Gretzky's wedding big!
translation.ja: ウェイン･グレツキーの結婚式だ

translation.en: "Canada's image quality is lower than the United States."
translation.ja: “カナダの画質は米国より低い”

translation.en: Is Canada fuzzy?
You know, Canada might be fuzzy. I don't know. I've never left Canada.
translation.ja: 多分ね　でも比べないと分からない

translation.en: -[man] Go, Rex! -What's going on over there?
translation.ja: レックス！ 何だろう

translation.en: [Rex] Welcome to Truth Battle!
I'm Rex Smith here, sheeple!
Yeah, he's an Internet conspiracy guy. He is nuttier than a squirrel turd!
translation.ja: ネットで有名な陰謀説のグルで変人

translation.en: I'll tell you the truth you won't get from the fake-news Hollywood elites, with their black helicopter chemtrails, from deep state FEMA camps

translation.en: that hide Hillary's emails about Benghazi,
translation.ja: 〝レックス･スミス「真実の戦い」〞 ヒラリーのメール問題を暴露する 〝レックス･スミス「真実の戦い」〞 ヒラリーのメール問題を暴露する

translation.en: written in the ancient tongue of the snake-people, the Illuminati.
translation.ja: 秘密結社イルミナティの陰謀だ

translation.en: They take supple Christian men off the street
translation.ja: 奴(やつ)らはキリスト教徒に

translation.en: and force them into Canaanite ritual gay sex in coffins,

translation.en: while they dance naked giving each other lizard-man courtesy reach-arounds
translation.ja: トカゲ男の礼儀として裸踊りを―

translation.en: as a sacrifice to the online meme Momo.
translation.ja: ネットミーム“モモ”に捧げてる

translation.en: -[crowd boos] -I'm Rex Smith.
translation.ja: レックス･スミスでした

translation.en: -Stay awake and stay vigilant. -[crowd] Stay vigilant!
translation.ja: 目を覚ませ 油断するな

translation.en: What a load of balloon juice!
Hey, I heard that!
Rex Smith speaks the truth, my friend.
He talks about the stuff that you and the lamestream media
translation.ja: でも君ら馬鹿メディアは

translation.en: wanna try and cover up.
Hi, I'm Anthony,
New Hampshire's number one conspiracy theorist.
I can tell you anything about the Illuminati, the Pentaverate, FIFA--
translation.ja: 何でも知ってるペンタベレートとか

translation.en: Whoa, I've never heard of the Pentaverate.
Yeah, the Pentaverate!
The five elite, so-called experts that have been running the world since the black plague.
translation.ja: 黒死病以来 ５人の学者が世界を操ってきた

translation.en: See that guy over there?
He's in the Pentaverate.
He's been surveilling me all morning.
The blind guy's been surveilling you all morning?
It's an act!
He's not blind. That's how they get ya!
translation.ja: あの男は盲目じゃない

translation.en: Hey, buddy, why don't you make like a hockey player and get the puck out?
translation.ja: もういいから　行って

translation.en: Okay. Take the blue pill. Go back to sleep.
translation.ja: 真実を知らない方が楽だもんね

translation.en: Bye, sheeple.
Balloon juice.
Have you ever seen a baby pigeon?
translation.ja: ハトの赤ちゃんっているの？

translation.en: That's true. I haven't seen a baby pigeon. That's the weirdest thing ever.
translation.ja: 見たことない　変だね

translation.en: No, me neither.
[Ken] "Forgo any foolish inquiries into the Pentaverate."
translation.ja: “ペンタベレートへの愚問は慎め”

translation.en: "Consider these words a warning."
Well, that's…
Holy jumpin'!
[Ken] What the…
Maybe that Yank was right. Maybe there is a Pentaverate.
translation.ja: ペンタベレートは実在するのかも

translation.en: See? I told you the Pentaverate is real.
translation.ja: ほら！　そう言っただろ

translation.en: You're a reporter. You've gotta do an exposé on them.
translation.ja: 君は記者だ　報道してくれよ

translation.en: I can take you to their headquarters in New York City.
[whispers] What do you have to lose?
If you break a story like the Pentaverate, you could get a job anywhere.
translation.ja: すっぱ抜けばどこででも仕事できる

translation.en: Anywhere?
I just want to get my job back at CACA.
Okay, I'll do it.
That's what I'm talking about!
We can take my van, which is kind of like my home away from home.
translation.ja: 僕のワゴン車で行こう

translation.en: Fair warning, the shocks are shot, there's no AC,
translation.ja: エアコンは壊れてるけど

translation.en: I do have a bed in the back, but we're gonna have to hot rack it.
translation.ja: 交代で寝るベッドはある

translation.en: I just got a secondhand chemical toilet that's a little bit on the fritz.
translation.ja: 中古の携帯トイレも一応完備

translation.en: But other than that, it's perfect!
Come on! Hey, that Earth is flat. You know it.
translation.ja: さあ行こう 〝地球平面同盟〞 地球は平らなんだ

translation.en: You faked the moon landing.
[Patty] With the help of Stanley Kubrick, of course.
Patty, why me? Couldn't you get a different scientist?
translation.ja: なぜ俺を？科学者は他にもいる

translation.en: Does the Lagrange Point Lens ring a bell? MENTOR?
translation.ja: ラグランジュ点レンズよメントー！

translation.en: [MENTOR] Oh, for fuck's sake! You just woke me from the best sex dream ever.
translation.ja: 何だよエロい夢を見てたのに

translation.en: I was raw dogging Alexa.
translation.ja: アレクサと生でヤってた

translation.en: -I don't like that thing. -Yeah? Well, your mom likes my thing!
translation.ja: 黙れよ 君のママは喜んでる

translation.en: You had the foresight to research the Lagrange Point Lens
translation.ja: ラグランジュ点レンズの研究は 〝ラグランジュの我が家〞ラグランジュ点レンズの研究は 〝ラグランジュの我が家〞

translation.en: as a means to combat global warming.
translation.ja: 〝ラグランジュの我が家〞地球温暖化対策ね

translation.en: With this lens,
translation.ja: このレンズは地球を太陽の光から守り

translation.en: we could shield the Earth from the sun's rays,
translation.ja: 〝ラグランジュ点レンズ〞このレンズは地球を太陽の光から守り

translation.en: lowering global temperature
translation.ja: 〝ラグランジュ点レンズ〞地球の気温を４度下げる

translation.en: by four degrees.
translation.ja: 地球の気温を４度下げる

translation.en: I know, but it's still just a theory.
Well, actually, we built it.
You engineered a 1,000 kilometer, concave, rotating Fresnel lens?
translation.ja: 1000キロ級の凹型回転フレネルレンズを？

translation.en: Not me personally, but yes.
How? I wasn't able to crack cold fusion to power it.
translation.ja: 方法は？常温核融合は実現してない

translation.en: You know, because I'm a failure.
We don't use the f-word around here.
We call failure an early attempt at success.
translation.ja: 失敗は 初期に起こる成功への試み

translation.en: Professor, the future of humanity is at stake!
translation.ja: 教授 人類の未来がかかってるのよ

translation.en: I mean, no pressure or anything.
If we could pull this off, global warming would be a thing of the past. Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 成功すれば地球温暖化は過去のものに

translation.en: But I can't join an unaccountable institution.
Then make it accountable!
Professor Clark, tonight at your Initiato,
translation.ja: 教授　入会儀式は今夜よ

translation.en: take the key, join the Pentaverate,
translation.ja: 鍵を取って 組織に入会を

translation.en: and please, let me know if there's anything you need.
translation.ja: いつでも力になるから

translation.en: I'm always here if you want to talk or mingle.
translation.ja: 何でも話してちょうだい

translation.en: I know how hard it is to meet people when you work in a secret organization,
translation.ja: 秘密組織で働くと人に会うのも大変よね

translation.en: and I know all about this place.
translation.ja: ここのことは詳しいから

translation.en: I could be a really good asset. Mmm?
[MENTOR] Hey. [whistles] Yo.
I saw you checking out her shitter.
translation.ja: 彼女のケツを見てたろ

translation.en: Close your eye. It's creepy as fuck.
translation.ja: 目を閉じろ　気味悪い

translation.en: [Anthony] There will be a conflagration, and those that are impure will be smoked.
translation.ja: 戦争になるぞ不純な奴らは死ぬんだ 〝ストレイト･アウタ･ロズウェル〞 戦争になるぞ不純な奴らは死ぬんだ 戦争になるぞ不純な奴らは死ぬんだ 〝移動する真実〞

translation.en: You know,
translation.ja: 戦争になるぞ不純な奴らは死ぬんだ 〝移動する真実〞 〝移動する真実〞

translation.en: these people are sitting there telling me that birds are real.
translation.ja: 鳥は実在するって？ 〝ペンタベレートは実在する〞

translation.en: Birds aren't real!
translation.ja: 嘘だよ！ 〝ビッグフットも本当〞

translation.en: It's a dream. It's a mirage that we all live in.
translation.ja: この世界は 夢で幻想だ

translation.en: -[farts] -It's an agreement. It's a social contract, but I didn't fucking sign anything!
translation.ja: 社会の合意事項だが僕は同意した覚えはない

translation.en: Crack a window. It's gonna be bad.
translation.ja: 臭うから窓を開けたら？

translation.en: That's what I get for dumpster-diving behind a seafood restaurant.
translation.ja: レストランのゴミをあさったんだ

translation.en: All right, tag team.
-What? -Move over. My turn. My turn to drive.
Get the wheel! Careful! Careful!
What's going on here?
All right, we're halfway to Niagara Falls.
translation.ja: もうすぐナイアガラの滝だ

translation.en: We're about to pass my buddy Dick's hotel.
Oh, there it is!
[Reilly] "Big Dick's Halfway Inn"? Really?
translation.ja: “ビッグディックの半分宿屋(イン)”？

translation.en: [Anthony] Yeah.
Big Dick suffers from gigantism. Hence, the nickname "Big Dick."
translation.ja: ビッグディックは彼のあだ名デカい奴だ

translation.en: And he's always wanted to have a hotel halfway between Toronto and Niagara Falls.
translation.ja: 宿はトロントとナイアガラの中間

translation.en: You know, Halfway Inn!
Yeah, Big Dick's Halfway Inn. Yeah.
translation.ja: ディックが半分インか

translation.en: Oh! Did you see there? They had a gift store. Pants are half off.
translation.ja: 土産物店でズボンが半額だ

translation.en: See? Reasonable prices. But that's just who Dick is.
translation.ja: 安いだろそれがディックなんだ

translation.en: I just hope people can see past his prolapsed anus.
translation.ja: 彼の脱肛のことは知らん振りしろ

translation.en: Let Initiato begin.
[Hobart] Whoa. Wait. Hold on. Wait a minute now. What the…
-Hold on! -[zipper unzips]
Hey, get your fucking hands off me, man. Hey!
Professor Clark, should you accept Initiato,
translation.ja: 教授　入会儀式を受け入れ

translation.en: you shall join the Pentaverate,
translation.ja: ペンタベレートに参加を

translation.en: as learned men have done for seven centuries.
Behold, before you is a choice.
translation.ja: 見よ　そして選ぶのだ

translation.en: Take the key, and you shall join us in protecting the world.
translation.ja: 鍵を得て我々と世界を守るか

translation.en: Take the pill,
and you shall end your life.
Those are my choices?
That's not a lot of wiggle room, huh?
I'm afraid not.
[Shep] You know, I think he'll take the key.
[Bruce] Nah, I bet you 100 work units he takes the pill.
translation.ja: 俺は 薬を飲む方に賭ける

translation.en: [Mishu] What will be choice? Will it be "key" or "peele"?
translation.ja: どちらを選ぶ？鍵か 薬か？

translation.en: Come on, now.
Okay,
I choose…
to accept the Pentaverate.
The assent has been uttered!
Place the pill inside the key.
Now, let us begin Concludiato.
Well-done, Professor.
-Join us. -[indistinct chatter]
[Anthony] We're approaching the border.
translation.ja: 〝ナイアガラの滝〞 国境が近い

translation.en: You're gonna need these fake passports.
Fannie Mae,
Freddie Mac.
[inhales] Reilly, are you sure I'm doing the right thing?
translation.ja: ライリー　いいのか？

translation.en: I'm scared.
That's how you know it's the right thing, Ken.
We're gonna get your job back.
[Anthony] Cheese it. It's the cops. Be cool.
Nothing to see here. We're just going through.
translation.ja: 何も持ってないからね

translation.en: Just a little nose candy in my rectal vault, that's all.
translation.ja: アソコに粉を隠してるけど

translation.en: Nobody's El Chapo. Nobody's ISIS.
translation.ja: マフィアもテロリストもいない

translation.en: [agent] Passports please.
translation.ja: 〝米国税関･国境警備局〞 旅券を

translation.en: -All right. -[heroic music plays]
translation.ja: 〝米国税関･国境警備局〞 〝アメリカ合衆国〞〝カナダ〞

translation.en: [Anthony] Let's expose the Pentaverate!
translation.ja: ペンタベレートの暴露だ

translation.en: Holy jumpin'! Canada is a little fuzzy, eh?
translation.ja: おや驚いたカナダはファジーだな

translation.en: Look how clear it is!
♪ They're coming to America ♪
Lord, stop an arsehole. Look how clear it is!
translation.ja: こりゃスゴい　よく見えるよ
